sentence.Network_en: Once outside the inner breakwater, we began to unfurl all the sails.
sentence.Network_cn: 一驶出内防波堤，我们就扬起了所有的船帆。

sentence.Network_en: Unfurl the banners, put on your armour. Let the fighting commence.
sentence.Network_cn: 展开旗帜, 穿上战甲,开始战斗.

sentence.Network_en: The exposition will unfurl 2008 Olympic Landscape Sculpture Designs Contest Selected Artworks Exhibition.
sentence.Network_cn: 2008奥运景观雕塑方案征集大赛入选艺术精品展.

list.abs: in this world now i am undying , I unfurl my flag my nation helpless .“在这个世界我是永生的，我高举自己的旗帜因为我的国家不能依靠”。
i unfurl my flag my nation helpless ., 我高举自己的旗帜因为我的国家不能依靠.
Huddled in the snow they unfurled flags and cheered for the cameras ., 聚在风雪中 , 他们展开了旗帜 , 对着镜头欢呼.
towage 拖曳,拖曳费to unfurl 展帆,打开帆to unship 从船上卸货.

entry.tran: 打开（伞等）；展开（帆、旗帜等）
entry.def: If you unfurl something rolled or folded such as an umbrella, sail, or flag, you open it, so that it is spread out. You can also say that it unfurls .

example.ex: Once outside the inner breakwater, we began to unfurl all the sails.
example.tran: 一驶出内防波堤，我们就扬起了所有的船帆。

example.ex: ...two weeks later when the leaves unfurl.

entry.def: If you say that events, stories, or scenes unfurl before you, you mean that you are aware of them or can see them as they happen or develop.

example.ex: ...as the dramatic changes in Europe continue to unfurl.
example.tran: 随着欧洲剧变不断展现在人们眼前

means.word_mean: 1. unroll, unfold, or spread out or be unrolled, unfolded, or spread out from a furled state;

auth_sentence.content: Greenwald's shrewdest move was to unfurl the flag.
auth_sentence.res_content: Greenwald's shrewdest move was to unfurl the flag.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Greenwald's shrewdest move was to unfurl the flag.

auth_sentence.content: Dust a work surface with flour and unfurl the pastry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dust a work surface with flour and unfurl the pastry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dust a work surface with flour and unfurl the pastry.

auth_sentence.content: I want a promise of pleasures yet to come as leaves slowly unfurl and brilliant colour follows.
auth_sentence.res_content: I want a promise of pleasures yet to come as leaves slowly unfurl and brilliant colour follows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I want a promise of pleasures yet to come as leaves slowly unfurl and brilliant colour follows.
